General.Name: Nyocor Co Ltd
General.Description: NYOCOR Co., Ltd. engages in the energy power generation business in China. It offers energy management services, technical services, and technical consultation; generates solar power technology; and develops resource recycling technology and wind farm related system. The company also sells solar thermal utilization, wind farm related, offshore wind power related, electrical machinery, and power transmission and distribution and control equipment, as well as photovoltaic equipment and components. Further it offers environmental protection equipment, and generators and generators sets; and information consulting services. The company was formerly known as Tianjin Quanyechang (Group) Co., Ltd. NYOCOR Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Beijing, China.

5.Name: Mr. Hui Yong  Wang
5.Title: Deputy Sec. of the Party Committee
